pages.text: All ceramic objects can now be smashed into Clay Dust, and their clay repurposed for use in other things. $(br2)Objects can be smashed into 5 Clay Dust if their recipe gives one item, or 1 Clay Dust if the recipe gives more than 1 item.
Clay Dust can be reconstituted into Clay by crafting it with a water jug.
Once you acquire a barrel, you can reconstitute clay more efficiently.
